**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:
ATTN: Google, Inc.

Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA, [private], USA
Fax: [private]

FROM:[private]
travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
E-mail: [private]@gmail.com

SUBJ: Copyright Infringement
DATE: September 28, 2007

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

The offender is www.chinayak.com . They copied 11 pages of contents and 11 images with our water mark from our website. So I am here to ask for your investigation and removal of the following infringing pages and images:

3. Hereunder is the detailed information on the images they have copied from our website:

(1) Our Copyrighted Image:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/images/photogallery/0032500/norbulingka%2010032360tm.jpg

[private]
[private]@gmail.com
www.travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.

5. The contact info of the copyright offender www.chinayak.com is:
Email: [private]@Hotmail.com

6. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

7. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,

[private]

Ps.: According to your instruction, all our copyright complaints can be sent to you only via email. Please refer to our faxed document to you on July 6th, 2007.s
